title: Chris Noth Dropped From ‘The Equalizer’ After Misconduct Accusations
sub_head: Actor’s ouster from CBS show comes after Peloton pulled ad featuring him playing Mr. Big from ‘Sex and the City’ reboot; talent agency also drops him
body:
Chris Noth has been dropped from the CBS television show “The Equalizer” and will no longer film any new episodes, the network said, adding to fallout from sexual-assault accusations that have been made against him.
Mr. Noth had been a recurring cast member on “The Equalizer” since its debut in February, playing a former CIA agent opposite actress and rapper Queen Latifah. A second season started this fall. A CBS spokeswoman said Mr. Noth would appear in one new episode that hasn’t aired yet as well as in reruns. She declined to comment further.
